meanings.definition: Opposed to or against white people or white culture.
meanings.sent1: The antiwhite remarks made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: Her antiwhite attitude was evident in her discriminatory actions.
meanings.sent3: The antiwhite cat refused to play with the white toys.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered in an antiwhite sky, signaling a change in weather.
meanings.sent5: The antiwhite graffiti on the wall was a stark reminder of the division in the community.

meanings.definition: Showing hostility or prejudice towards white individuals or groups.
meanings.sent1: He received backlash for his antiwhite comments.
meanings.sent2: The antiwhite protesters clashed with the peaceful demonstrators.
meanings.sent3: The antiwhite snowman melted away under the hot sun.
meanings.sent4: Her words cut through the room like an antiwhite knife.
meanings.sent5: The antiwhite sentiment in the room was palpable, creating tension among the guests.
